DOC.brief_summary: CVC Pros and Cons of scheduled Triple-lumen Central Venous Catheter Exchange: A Prospective Controlled Randomized Study
DOC.brief_title: Scheduled Triple-lumen Central Venous Catheter Exchange: A Prospective Controlled Randomized Study
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients who require the placement of a central venous catheter for medical purposes and have an absence of infection.
